title: Dublin/London Harris/Murray & NEW USA 12 RULES TOUR
description:
DUBLIN and LONDON (July 14 & 16) : I will be meeting Sam Harris and Douglas Murray for a discussion of philosophical and scientific issues relating to religion, belief and politics – continuing, in part, the discussions I had with Sam in Vancouver in the third week of June. Tickets are still available, but it might be good to pick them up soon, as the Vancouver venues sold out:
UK (with Sam Harris and Douglas Murray): 
 
Sat July 14 Dublin, Ireland: https://bit.ly/2pU8go9 
Mon July 16 London, England: https://bit.ly/2IHD0UM 
 
NEW USA CITIES 12 RULES FOR LIFE TOUR (Sept/Oct): Because of the positive response from audiences and from individual audience members, I have added another 19 US cities to the 12 Rules Tour (ticket sale links below). 

Use code DRJBP until Fri, June 26

Wed Sept 05, Rochester, NY: https://bit.ly/2MZGrpf 
Thurs Sept 06 Westbury, NY: https://bit.ly/2yGTVD6 
Fri Sept 07 Wallingford, CT: https://bit.ly/2yKo04Q 
Sun Sept 09 Baltimore, MD: https://bit.ly/2tFMN4m 
Mon Sept 10 Durham, NC: https://bit.ly/2K9r9jX 
Thurs Sept 13 Miami, FL: https://bit.ly/2Iu1Hjq 
Fri Sept 14 Orlando, FL: https://bit.ly/2yMsKHc 
Sat Sept 15 St. Petersburg, FL: https://bit.ly/2lzeFDB 
Sun Sept 16 Jacksonville, FL: https://bit.ly/2KpYiav 
Tues Sept 18 Cincinnati, OH: https://bit.ly/2twOrGd 
Wed Sept 19 Cleveland, OH: https://bit.ly/2Koed5Z 
Thurs Sept 20 Grand Rapids, MI: https://bit.ly/2MqpQKg 
Tues Oct 02 Des Moines, IA: https://bit.ly/2Mrl2nY 
Wed Oct 03 St. Louis, MO: https://bit.ly/2tERFqh 
Thurs Oct 04 Kansas City, MO: https://bit.ly/2MVukcM 
Sun Oct 07 Denver, CO: https://bit.ly/2N241li 
Mon Oct 08 Colorado Springs, CO: https://bit.ly/2lzK1tF 
Wed Oct 10 San Antonio, TX: https://bit.ly/2txfHEr 
Thurs Oct 11 Irving, TX: https://bit.ly/2MsK9a3 
 
You can get presale tickets using the code DRJBP until Thursday June 28 at 10:00 pm. Tickets go on sale to everyone Friday June 29 at 10:00 am. 

I am touring Canada in July and August. Dates, locations and tickets links are listed jordanbpeterson.com/events.

Finally, I will be speaking in about a dozen cities in Europe in October and November, and Australia in February. Those venues and dates will be announced in the next few weeks.

--- SUPPORT THIS CHANNEL ---

Direct Support: https://www.jordanbpeterson.com/donate
Merchandise: https://teespring.com/stores/jordanbpeterson

--- BOOKS ---

12 Rules for Life: An Antidote to Chaos: https://jordanbpeterson.com/12-rules-for-life/
Maps of Meaning: The Architecture of Belief: https://jordanbpeterson.com/maps-of-meaning/

--- LINKS ---

--- PRODUCTS ---

Understand Myself personality test: https://understandmyself.com/
Merchandise: https://teespring.com/stores/jordanbpeterson

transcript_parts.text: Hi
I'm here at the airport in Portland about 50 cities into what is going to be a hundred city tour
It's going exceptionally well
Audiences in each city and the people I've met afterward have been very enthusiastic
There seems to be a rapidly developing market for relatively long-form intellectual discourse
Driven by YouTube and podcasts which have none of the bandwidth limitations of traditional media forms
I just had two evenings of productive discussion with Sam Harris in Vancouver
I'm going to post my notes from those talks on my blog at Jordan B Peterson dot.com
We talked about the relationship between facts and values and the role that narrative and story might play in bringing the two together
for better or worse
The Vancouver events sold out
The next discussion with Sam, the third, which will also feature Douglas Murray
Will take place in Dublin Ireland on the 14th of July at the three Arena
Followed by the final fourth discussion at the o2 arena in London on the 16th
Tickets for those discussions are still available. You can find them at the events page on my website
That's Jordan B Peterson com or in the written description of this video below
All the discussions with Sam are being filmed
And will be released in video and podcast form within the next few months after the remaining two discussions in Dublin and London
Because of the positive response from audiences and from individual audience members
I've added another 19 cities to the 12 rules tour these include Rochester, Westbury Wallingford
Baltimore Durham Miami Orlando st. Petersburg and Jacksonville
Cincinnati and Cleveland Grand Rapids Des Moines st. Louis, Kansas City, Denver
Colorado Springs, San Antonio and Irving
You can get presale tickets using the code doctor jbp until Thursday
June 28 at 10 p.m. Tickets go on sale everyone Friday, June 29th at 10 a.m
I'm also touring Canada in July and August
dates locations and ticket links are also listed below in the video description and
available at jordan b peterson dot.com
Finally i'll be speaking in about a dozen cities in Europe in October in November and Australia in February
Those venues and dates will be announced in the next few weeks
Thanks for watching or listening
I'm looking forward to seeing you potentially at one of these lectures
Bye for now from Portland
